body_content.explanation: not depressed (= unhappy and without hope), or not suffering from depression (= a mental illness in which a person is very unhappy and anxious for long periods and cannot have a normal life during these periods):
examples: Compared with children of nondepressed mothers, children of depressed mothers had higher levels of anxiety and social problems.
Depressed and non-depressed children have been found to differ in their perceptions of self-worth.
Don't forget that even non-depressed people get upset when bad or stressful things happen to them.
